    • Method Detail

      • close

        public int close()
        Close Psam Card.
        Returns:
        Close Result. 0 : Success, Other : Fail.

      • detect

        public int detect()
        Detecting the Psam Card.
        Returns:
        Detect Result. 0 : Psam Card Inserted, Other : Psam Card Not Inserted.

      • getCardReaderInfo

        public com.pos.sdk.cardreader.PosCardReaderInfo getCardReaderInfo()
        Get Card Information List.
        Returns:
        PosCardReaderInfo :
        mCategory : Card Reader Category. (Icc Card, Picc Card, Mag Card, Mifare Card, Psam Card)
        mCardType : Card Type.
        mCardChannel : Card Logical Channel Number.
        mSerialNum : Serial Number of Card, BCD Encoding.
        mAttribute : Card Attribute. (ATR)

      • open

        public int open()
        Open Psam Card.
        Returns:
        Open Result. 0 : Success, Other : Fail.

      • open

        public int open(int slot)
        Open Psam Card With Slot Parameters.
        Parameters:
        slot - Slot, Default Value 1.
        Returns:
        Open Result. 0 : Success, Other : Fail.

      • open

        public int open(int slot,
                int baudrate)
        Open Psam Card With Baudrate Parameters.
        Parameters:
        slot - Slot, Default Value 1.
        baudrate - Value Range :
        POICardManager.CARDREADER_BAUDRATE_9600
        POICardManager.CARDREADER_BAUDRATE_19200
        POICardManager.CARDREADER_BAUDRATE_38400
        Returns:
        Open Result. 0 : Success, Other : Fail.

      • open

        public int open(int slot,
                int baudrate,
                int voltage)
        Open Psam Card With Baudrate and Voltage Parameters.
        Parameters:
        slot - Slot, Default Value 1.
        baudrate - Value Range :
        POICardManager.CARDREADER_BAUDRATE_9600
        POICardManager.CARDREADER_BAUDRATE_19200
        POICardManager.CARDREADER_BAUDRATE_38400
        voltage - Value Range :
        POICardManager.CARDREADER_VOLTAGE_50V
        POICardManager.CARDREADER_VOLTAGE_18V
        POICardManager.CARDREADER_VOLTAGE_33V
        Returns:
        Open Result. 0 : Success, Other : Fail.

      • transmitApdu

        public int transmitApdu(byte[] inBuf,
                        com.pos.sdk.utils.PosByteArray rspBuf,
                        com.pos.sdk.utils.PosByteArray swBuf)
        APDU Instruction Interaction.
        Parameters:
        inBuf - APDU Command
        rspBuf - Card Response Result :
        Len : Response Data Length.
        Buffer : Response Data.
        swBuf - Card Response Result :
        Len : Response Data Length.
        Buffer : Response Data.
        Returns:
        APDU Instruction Interaction Result. 0 : Success, Other : Fail.
